dt2.5:1.1: Rūpakkhandhena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā?
dt2.5:1.2: Te dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:2.3: saṅkhārakkhandhena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
dt2.5:2.4: te dhammā dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:3.6: manindriyena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
dt2.5:3.7: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:4.4: phoṭṭhabbadhātuyā ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
dt2.5:4.5: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:5.5: jīvitindriyena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
dt2.5:5.6: te dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:6.3: nirodhasaccena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
dt2.5:6.4: te dhammā dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:7.2: kāyindriyena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
dt2.5:7.3: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:8.15: avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
dt2.5:8.16: te dhammā dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:9.1: Saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
dt2.5:9.2: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:10.1: Viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
dt2.5:10.2: te dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:11.1: Nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatanena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
dt2.5:11.2: te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:12.5: kammabhavena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
dt2.5:12.6: te dhammā dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:13.4: iddhipādena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
dt2.5:13.5: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:14.5: maraṇena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
dt2.5:14.6: te dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:15.1: Paridevena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
dt2.5:15.2: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:16.18: manasikārena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
dt2.5:16.19: te dhammā dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:17.1: Cittena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
dt2.5:17.2: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:19.1: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttehi dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.5:19.2: dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttehi dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.5:19.3: adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttehi dhammehi ye dhammā ….
dt2.5:35.3: ajjhattabahiddhārammaṇehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
dt2.5:35.4: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:36.2: anidassanasappaṭighehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
dt2.5:36.3: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:37.2: hetūhi ceva sahetukehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.5:37.3: hetūhi ceva hetusampayuttehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
dt2.5:37.4: te dhammā dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:38.3: sahetukehi ceva na ca hetūhi dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.5:38.4: hetusampayuttehi ceva na ca hetūhi dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.5:38.5: na hetusahetukehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
dt2.5:38.6: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:39.2: asaṅkhatehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
dt2.5:39.3: te dhammā dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:40.2: sappaṭighehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
dt2.5:40.3: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:41.1: Rūpīhi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
dt2.5:41.2: te dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:42.2: lokuttarehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
dt2.5:42.3: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:43.2: āsavehi ceva sāsavehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.5:43.3: āsavehi ceva āsavasampayuttehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
dt2.5:43.4: te dhammā dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:44.3: āsavasampayuttehi ceva no ca āsavehi dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.5:44.4: āsavavippayuttehi anāsavehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
dt2.5:44.5: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:45.7: parāmāsehi ceva parāmaṭṭhehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
dt2.5:45.8: te dhammā dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:46.4: sārammaṇehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
dt2.5:46.5: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:47.9: upādādhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
dt2.5:47.10: te dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:48.1: Cittehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
dt2.5:48.2: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:49.6: cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattīhi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
dt2.5:49.7: te dhammā dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:50.1: Ajjhattikehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
dt2.5:50.2: te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:51.3: kilesehi ceva saṅkilesikehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.5:51.4: kilesehi ceva saṅkiliṭṭhehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.5:51.5: kilesehi ceva kilesasampayuttehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…
dt2.5:51.6: te dhammā dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:52.4: saṅkiliṭṭhehi ceva no ca kilesehi dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.5:52.5: kilesasampayuttehi ceva no ca kilesehi dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.5:52.24: saraṇehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā?
dt2.5:52.25: Te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
